name: Fly to the light
description:
-Should we fly to the light?
+Bzzz... I don't think that's a good idea.

Fly to the light is an arcade game developed during IndieDevJam 2020. Up to 4 players can compete against each other to decide who will be the last fly alive and win!

Hope you enjoy it ;)

Developed  by Alter Ego:

Twitter: @AlterEgoGameDev

ArtDiego Pérez Izquierdo
Pablo Rodríguez ÁlvarezDesignJorge Durán González-Quijano
Juan Carlos García Fernández
Jorge Sánchez Librero

ProgrammingJavier Estefanía Ramírez
Marcos Pérez Redondo

Music by Kevin MacLeod
